Text: RE Response to PX Answer to Chargeback Complaintagree with Howard but we have some additional information about the PXs attitude towards the FERC proceding visavis the bankrupty court which we will relate at Pleading needs to be revised on settlement judge point at a minimum Original Message From Howard Shapiro mailto Sent March PM To Cheryl Feik Ryan Gary Bachman Julie Richardson Subject Re Response to PX Answer to Chargeback Complaint Thanks for the draft We are informed that the PX has filed in Chapter It may argue that FERCs proceedings fall within the automatic stay and that even if they dont the accounting we are proposing inappropriately overlaps the role of the bankruptcy court This message contains information which may be confidential and privileged Unless you are the addressee or authorized to receive for the addressee you may not use copy or disclose to anyone the message or any information contained in the message If you have received the message in error please advise the sender by reply email mofocom and delete the message Thank you very much
